title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to encourage investment in facilities using wind to produce electricity, and for other purposes.
content: Wind Power Tax Incentives Act of 2003 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow: (1) passive activity losses and credits attributable to qualified wind energy facilities. (2) the wind energy credit to be used against the alternative minimum tax. And (3) the pass-through of a cooperative's wind energy credit to the cooperative's members.
